exceptions.exn: Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

original: rewrite sss_steps_inv. intros [H1 H2]. - subst. exfalso. apply H0. reflexivity. - destruct H1 as [k' [st1 [Hk [Hstep1 Hsteps]]]]. exists k'. split. ++ omega. ++ apply mm_sss_INC_inv in Hstep1. destruct Hstep1 as [Hi [Hw]]. subst. auto.
